name: Boreal (Spain) Sendai - Mens

specs.value: Premium quality 1,8mm split leather. Lateral PU overlay for protection. HFS padding system for perfect heel fit
PU Air Net for ventilation and comfort
Boreal PXF with shock absorbing EVA layer for comfort
Michelin Terra. Rubber sole with integrated toecap and EVA rand. TPU piece under the toes and heel for support and stability. OCX compound from Michelin for superb grip
Technical approach. Paths, trails and off-road. Street use
